alert.note: Alert for Amite (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 4:33PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern St. Helena, northeastern East Feliciana Parishes in southeastern Louisiana and Amite Counties through 530 PM CDT... At 431 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over mainly rural areas of southern Amite County, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Liberty, Centreville, Gloster, Felps, Gillsburg and Crosby. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
